original_text: Moreover ye shall take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which is guilty of death: but he shall be surely put to death.
korean_text: 고의로 살인죄를 범한 살인자는 생명의 속전을 받지 말고 반드시 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: Moreover ye shall take no satisfaction
for the life of a murderer
but he shall be surely put to death
